Add Geocoding Info to dataset via zipcodeR database

Source: R/use_zipcoder.R
use_zipcoder.Rd

A list of enrollment applications pending CMS contractor review for physicians & non-physicians.

Links

  • Physician Office Visit Costs (Data.CMS.gov)

Usage

use_zipcoder(df)

Arguments

df

tidytable from download_dataset()

Value

A tidytable

Examples

search_datasets(specialty = "vascular surgery") |>
download_dataset() |>
tidytable::slice_tail(n = 5) |>
use_zipcoder()
#> # A tidytable: 5 × 20
#>   city      county state zip_c…¹ speci…² new_t…³ new_p…⁴ new_p…⁵ new_p…⁶ new_c…⁷

#> 2 Point Ba… Princ… AK    99927   vascul…   99203    74.8    234.    117.    18.7
